Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Belmont
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Belmont due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Belmont due to police activity.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
